file_content.text: The mother of my children. Reduced to ruin by a parent's folly.
I know Valkorion's there. Let me speak with him... one last time.
Valkorion.
Senya. "The kiss of Izax warms you..."
"...and lights your eternal flame."
You remembered.
I've never forgotten. How you sang to me on Aivela's Crest. How you turned your back on your children.
How you made them kill your enemies, kill each other, all for a taste of approval that would never come. Why?
You know why.
May Izax save my son.
I'll be sure to tell Arcann about this touching moment, right before I kill him.
You can't save him.
You are truly the son Valkorion always wanted.
Mother...? You were mine!
Arcann is close. We must hurry.
You fought for the Eternal Empire, for the Alliance, for your family. Now you may die with honor, Senya Tirall.
Die with honor.
You threw your life away for Arcann. Why?
Why die for Arcann?
I never fought hard enough.
To give him hope.
You are truly the daughter Valkorion always wanted.
Aaargh!
Ugh... that's gonna leave a mark. I'll stay here and keep the Skytroopers off your back.
